mapper.select: SELECT CAFE_ID as cafeId, CAFE_NAME as cafeName, ADDRESS as address, DETAIL_ADDRESS as detailAddress, ZIP_CODE as zipCode, CALL_NUMBER as callNumber, INTRODUCTION as introduction, STATUS as status, MAIN_IMAGE as mainImage, PAGE_CREATED_DATE as pageCreatedDate, EMAIL as email FROM CAFE_INFO WHERE CAFE_ID = #{cafeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAFE_INFO (CAFE_NAME, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, CALL_NUMBER, INTRODUCTION, MAIN_IMAGE, PAGE_CREATED_DATE, EMAIL) VALUES (#{cafeName}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{zipCode}, #{callNumber}, #{introduction}, #{mainImage}, NOW(), #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT CAFE_NAME as cafeName, AVG_RATING as avgRating, TOTAL_COUNT as totalCount, MAIN_IMAGE as mainImage FROM CAFE_SUMMARY_VIEW WHERE CAFE_ID = #{cafeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE CAFE_INFO SET CAFE_NAME = #{cafeName}, ADDRESS = #{address}, DETAIL_ADDRESS= #{detailAddress}, ZIP_CODE=#{zipCode}, CALL_NUMBER=#{callNumber}, INTRODUCTION=#{introduction}, MAIN_IMAGE=#{mainImage} WHERE CAFE_ID = #{cafeId};
